original_text: And all the country wept with a loud voice, and all the people passed over: the king also himself passed over the brook Kidron, and all the people passed over, toward the way of the wilderness.
korean_text: 온 땅 사람이 큰 소리로 울며 모든 백성이 앞서 건너가매 왕도 기드론 시내를 건너가니 건너간 모든 백성이 광야 길로 향하니라

sentences.original_text: And all the country wept with a loud voice,
and all the people passed over:
the king also himself passed over the brook Kidron,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕도 또한 스스로 기드론 시내를 건넜고,

sentences.original_text: and all the people passed over,
toward the way of the wilderness.
